message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love! I'm offering it to you for $150. It's worth every penny, but I'm willing to negotiate a bit. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product! While $80 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $120.  This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $120, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
